settings.title: About us
settings.subtitle:
Welzo is the first all-in-one integrated healthcare platform, offering access to the three main verticals of digital healthcare: online GP appointments, healthcare products, and remote health tests powered by AI-driven insights.

Welzo is dedicated to delivering the latest in health and wellness, providing our community with access to cutting-edge treatments, and supporting individuals on their journey to better health. Our mission is to empower people to live healthier, more fulfilling lives by connecting them with innovative healthcare solutions.

settings.title: Our mission
settings.text1: Getting an appointment with your GP can be lengthy and time-consuming. The average patient in the UK has to wait at least 15 days before they can speak to a GP and a further 4 - 8 weeks if a consultation is required. But getting access to quick and affordable healthcare does not have to be this complicated.
settings.text2: That's why we created Welzo. We offer instant online consultations, giving you access to treatment and testing from the comfort of your home within minutes. This is the future of healthcare, no more waiting rooms. We offer personalised testing and medication instantly online and delivered the next day to your house.

settings.title: Created by the HMI Group
settings.text: The HMI Group was founded in 1979, providing medical services for blue chip corporations such as Qatar Gas, the UK's Ministry of Defence and the Bank of New York. Welzo was founded by the HMI Group to provide affordable and easily accessible medication and personalised health tests due to the strain faced by the UK's NHS.
settings.name: HMI Group

settings.title: UKAS & CQC Registered Labs
settings.text:
Welzo has over eight different laboratories across the UK, Denmark and Italy. This enables us to cover a vast range of diagnostic tests, genetic tests, epigenetic tests and standard biomarkers.
All labs in the UK are both CQC and UKAS registered. In addition to this, our international labs also hold ISO accreditations.

settings.title: Trusted and GPhC Regulated Pharmacies
settings.text: Online pharmacy works by connecting patients to authorised and regulated GPhC pharmacies to provide access to medication, supplements and support through our Welzo network.

settings.title: Healthcare has never been this easy
Health tests
settings.text: We have a wide range of tests to cover your health needs. Order with next day delivery and avoid sitting in a doctor's office or clinic. Use our quiz to find the right test for you.

settings.title: Medication
settings.text: Welzo Pharmacy works with over 25 pharmacy chains across the UK to provide affordable treatments and medication delivered to the comfort of your home.

settings.title: Occupational tests
settings.text: We specialise in corporate and occupation health checks. If you need a pre-employment medical before working abroad or need to test your staff for health and safety reasons, we have you covered.

settings.caption: Labs and accuracy
settings.text: We work with UKAS accredited labs in the UK, Italy and Denmark. Find out more about our labs and how our testing process works.

settings.caption: Customer stories
settings.text: We have helped over 500,000 patients get access to their healthcare needs. Read some of their stories below.
